text:
Mina Capital | Malta | anywhere, Remote

We are seeking a sub-advisor for a fund($4mm). We currently have a strategy but are looking to diversify our strategies within the spot fx class.

Strategies should be automated and have a verifiable 90-day track record and be able to scale to at least $10mm.

We prefer candidates with a good educational background and industry experience but they are not required. Compensation will be a % of the fund's fees. You maintain all rights to your system.

please contact me, Ed, here: eorothes@gmail.com
